methods.apply:
Apply this function to the input chunk, returning an output chunk.

 The result is owned by this ToLongFunctor.

:param input: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.Chunk<ShortToLongCastWithOffset.T>) - the chunk to transform
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.LongChunk<ShortToLongCastWithOffset.T>) the result LongChunk
methods.castInto:
Note: Java generics information - <T2 extends io.deephaven.engine.chunk.Attributes.Any>

:param input: io.deephaven.engine.chunk.ShortChunk<T2>
:param result: io.deephaven.engine.chunk.WritableLongChunk<T2>
:param offset: long

text: Cast the values in the input chunk to an long and add the specified offset.
